title: Kadin Isterse
overview: Canan, who is married and has two children, loses his beauty over time. She has already been aged over the aesthetic problems that have already existed. In contrast, his wife Zafer is a very well-groomed man. His interest in his wife has diminished over time. The women around them are attracted to attention. Zafer, his assistant is in love with Alev. Candan lived the biggest catastrophe that a woman could ever have.
